sentence.Network_en: We arrived on Washington's Birthday, a freezing , blowy, snowy day.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们到的那天正是华盛顿的诞辰, 风雪交加, 天气极冷.

sentence.Network_en: It was a rough and blowy night when Cowperwood started for this institution under duress.
sentence.Network_cn: 当柯帕乌被逼动身到这个机关里去的时候,是寒风刺骨的夜里.

sentence.Network_en: It is snowy, and blowy, and gusty, and bitter cold!
sentence.Network_cn: 这里在下雪, 狂风呼啸, 而且非常寒冷!
